definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: prob. helmet, cap (> al. mantle, e.g. K:§ 62; v. Dr) (NH [[כַּרְבָּלָה]] comb of cock ; so JAram. [[כַּרְבָּלְתָא]], Syr.karbolto0; As. karballatu, cap Andr:M 67 *, Muss-Arn:As. Dict. 436 a; so SAC:JPhii. xxvi. 310 f., cf. BH [[[כרבל]]]);—pl. sf. [[כַּרְבְּלָֽתְהוֹן]] Da 3:21.
